name: A True Foe - The Giadrome!
quest-details: Within a group of the sly carnivorous Giaprey, there is a leader. They call it the Giadrome. I need a hunter's strength to show that pack of beasts and their leader who's boss!

name: Reckless Bulldrome Hunter
quest-details: My son decided to become a hunter and ran off after a Bulldrome on his own! Of course, now the tables have turned and I'm worried! Hunt down the Bulldrome on the Snowy Mountains

name: A Pack of Blangos
quest-details: A large pack of Blangos are massing nearby. They are violent enough that a large group will quickly become uncontrollable. Please slay 15 of the apes!

name: Mountain Herb Picking
quest-details: I want to pick some of this village's famous Mountain Herbs for my brother in town, but there are too many monsters! Could you please go out for me and bring back 20 Mountain Herbs?

name: Rarest of the Rare Beasts
quest-details: Do you know of  a pink, fanged beast that roams the jungle? That beast has dirtied my shop beyond hope! It's impossible to clean up! Get rit of it before I'm spoiled again!

name: Hunt the Rare Forest Congas!
quest-details: I took a trip to the jungle and saw some beautiful pink animals with fangs. But when I tried to pet them from my carriage, the beasts made a stink on me! I can't get it off! Punish those meanies!

name: A Mushroom Goldrush
quest-details: Mushrooms from the jungle are skyrocketing in price! if you were to gather 20 of them for me, you would be justly compensated. However, I hear the area is infested with carnivores, so beware!

name: The Land Shark
quest-details: A villager was tracking a pack of monsters, but lost sight of them in the dessert. Please find the leader of the pack and hunt it down for us.

name: The Giant Enemy Crab
quest-details: A giant crab is wandering around the dessert! However, no normal sword is capable of cracking its shell! I hat to ask for help from other hunters, but please lend me your skills!

name: The Lady Gourmet
quest-details: I travel the world for new tastes and flavors. Now I want to try the liver of Piscine Wyvern, a taste few others have experienced. Please bring me 8 of these livers!

name: The Shadow in the Mountains
quest-details: We were exploring a snow-covered mountain near here, but stumbled on this digusting blob-like monster! If you can't get rid of that thing, our research is doomed! Help us!

name: The King of the Mountains
quest-details: A Blangonga has staked its claim to a place of the Snowy Mountains, Now we can't enter the area to gather firewood. Exterminate the Blangonga!

name: A Swarm of Hermitaurs
quest-details: Fishing is no easy endeavor, but lately things have gotten out of hand! While unloading my ship, a swam of Hermitaurs appeared. Slay 10 of them and let me get on with my work!

name: Water Wyvern in the Desert
quest-details: I found a giant water wyvern in a cave in the desert! I can't defeat it because it stays underwater. Slay it for me and the glory is all yours!

name: Gypceros: Venomous Terror
quest-details: The fields all around the town are getting torn to shreds by a gigantic poisonous bird-like monster, Exterminate it for us! Its poison can melt crops, so be careful it doesn't melt you!

name: Supreme Ruler of the Swamp
quest-details: Hunters! It is time to hunt down the Shogun Ceanataur. Let us rid the swamp zone of this menace and expand our strategic possibilities. This is a highly classified hunt, So don't tell a soul!

name: Slay the Great Kut-Ku
quest-details: A bird-like Yian Kut-Ku is attacking people the world over! It has even shown up in these very hills! If it isn't eliminated soon, we're finished! Show me what you're made of!

name: Eliminate the Rathalos!
quest-details: I request the assistance of only the bravest of hunters to find and hunt the Rathalos that has appeared near here. Of course, a handsome reward will be paid upon success.

name: Attack of the Rathian
quest-details: My caravan was wiped out by the queen of the skies, the killder Rathian! I'll pay you whatever you ask if you hunt down that foul creature! Help me kind hunter, you're my only hope!

name: Gathering - Snowy Mountains
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A daytime gathering quest on the Snowy Mountains. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up.

name: Gathering - Jungle Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A daytime gathering quest in the Jungle. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up.

name: Gathering - Desert Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A daytime gathering quest in the Desert. Gather all the materials you can from the filed, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up.

name: Giadrome Assault
quest-details: After you killed those Giaprey, their leader showed up and it's not a happy camper! It's bigger, and has a green crest. Find it and kill it!

name: The Mountain Roughrider
quest-details: The thick skinned Bulldrome is well adapted to life in the mountain. Yet it's nothing but a pest for those of us living amongst the peaks! Which is why I'd like you to get rid of it!

name: Slay the Giaprey!
quest-details: I chased off a Giaprey that was feeding on my Popos, but now it's back with 19 of its buddies! I can't take on the whole lot of them! Hunters, this is your chance! Please get rid of them for me!

name: Find the Mountain Herbs!
quest-details: Steeping Mountain Hervs in this special brew has miraculous medical effects. Hoever, I've run out of the herbs essential to the concoction. Find 20 of them and bring them to me!

name: Hunt Down the Velocidrome!
quest-details: It seems that whenver my wife goes to pick mushrooms in the Jungle, a large carnivore appears! There's no way I can let her go pick mushrooms now... Please! Make the Jungle safe again!

name: Blue Menace of the Jungle
quest-details: I want you to hunt and kill the giant bird-like monster that has appeared in our jungle. It's wreaking havoc on our environment!

name: Cunning Raiders
quest-details: A group of blue scaled, pack hunting carnivores called Velociprey have infested the jungle. Please slay 20 of them for us... But beware of their boss!

name: Attack of the Giant Bugs!
quest-details: My village is under attack by a swarm of bug monsters! It seems there are about 50 of them. One on one they are not a threat, but as a group they are deadly. so be careful.

name: The Mushroom Hunt!
quest-details: My doggie just looooves Special Mushrooms! I'd like you to bring me 20 of them, as I can't resist his puppy dog eyes. However, beware of that filthy pink vagrant brute!

name: Panning for Goldenfish
quest-details: I'd do anything to get my hands on some legendary Goldenfish! I'm begging you to bring me 2 of them! Wait! Make that 3! Please catch these fish and bring them here!

name: Hunt the Gendrome!
quest-details: My caravans are being hit by packs of Genprey. It appears there is an extraordinarily powerful boss among them! Hunt down the monster and make the roads safe again for all!

name: The Land Shark
quest-details: Our pack-animals were eaten by something in the desrt. But nobody actually saw the monster attack! Track down this vile beast and take it out!

name: The Lurking Desert Giant
quest-details: When some of my clan went gathering in the desser, they were attacked by an enormous crab, nya! As long as he's around, we can't do business. Help us, nya!

name: Slay the Genprey!
quest-details: I'm too injured to go on... The  Genprey living in the desert have the power to paralyze their foes. I'd like you to find the pack that did this to me and kill 20 of the fiends!

name: Liver of Legend!
quest-details: Hello sirs and madams! I deal in reare items that I find the desert. Recently I've got a buyer for Piscine Wyvern and Sand Wyvern livers. Deliver 10 of them to me!

name: Gone Fishin'
quest-details: Fishing. It carries on in the hearts of children and remains a simple pleasure for adults. Hearken back to a simpler time and bring me back 3 of the desert's most precious gift... Goldnfish!

name: Attack of the Yian Kut-Ku
quest-details: That big eared Yian Kut-Ku really made mincemeat out of me! It's out of my league, so I  want you to hunt it down for me! He's all yours!

name: Charge... Charge... Charge!
quest-details: We have a plan to rid the Swamp of the scourage of the bulldrome: however, we do not have enough hunters for the job. That is why we need your help! Let us rid the Swamp of this foul beast!

name: The Mishchief Maker
quest-details: I took a trip to the Swamp and saw a pretty pink animal with fangs. But when I tried to call it to the carriage, it threw something dirty at me and now I can't get the smell off! Punish it!

name: The Ruler of the Snow
quest-details: As the representative of the Hunter's Guild, allow me to lay out our requrest. We would like you to hunt down the proud ruler of the mountains, the Blangonga... But you must be prepared!

name: Gathering - Swamp Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A daytime gathering quest in the Swamp. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up.

name: Gathering - Forest and Hills
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A daytime gathering quest in the Forest and Hills. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up.

name: Gathering - Volcanic Zone
goal-condition: Time Over or Deliver the Paw Pass Ticket
quest-details: A daytime gathering quest in the Volcanic Zone. Gather all the materials you can from the field, then deliver the Paw Pass Ticket to finish up.

name: The Ruler of the Snow
quest-details: As the representative of the Hunter's Guild, allow me to lay out our requrest. We would like you to hunt down the proud ruler of the mountains, the Blangonga... But you must be prepared!

name: The Shadow in the Cave
quest-details: We were exploring a cave near here, but stumbled on this digusting blob-like monster! If you can't get rid of that thing, our research is doomed! Help us!

name: Red Shadow in the Snow
quest-details: I've always longed to venture into the Snowy Mountains! I think I could hunt down an Anteka, but I could never fight a wyvern. Maybe you could take care of a special monster for me...

name: Blango Slaying Tactics
quest-details: The pelt of a Blango can be made into various pieces of armor that are useful in everyday life. Slay 20 of the beasts and bring me their pelts. Beware of the Blangonga

name: The Subterranean Glutton
quest-details: I'm after the rare larvae of the Khezu. They should be on the summit, so search there. These whelps aren't to be taken lightly. If you run out of Pickaxes, combine a bone with a rock!

name: Master of the Giant Lake
quest-details: Hunt down the water wyvern that keeps harassing my shipyard! Your target is a monster that can shoot water with incredible force, so beware! Heh heh heh!

name: The Pink Fur Party
quest-details: A huge group of Congas, along with one of their big pink bosses are gathering together. Please get rid of 20 of them... I think it will drive the rest away! Help me, pretty please!

name: The Hidden Jungle Clouds
quest-details: I thought dark clouds had covered the moon, but it was actually a swarm of Hornetaurs! The jungle is covered with the bugs and I need you to exterminate 50 of the Hornetaur pests!

name: The Underwater Terror
quest-details: The lake underneath the desert is connected to an underground river and patrolled by a green-scaled water wyvern... If you are truly a hunter, then it should pose no problem.

name: Evening Hermitaur Sonata
quest-details: Those pesky Hermitaurs are starting to get in the way of business. They hide in the sand and ambush you at a moment's notice. I also spotted a Daimyo Hermitaur, so be extremely careful!

name: The Purple Poison Menace
quest-details: I saw a gigantic bird-like monster deep in the Swamp! It scared everyone so bad that I can't do business with a thing like that out there! Please hunt it down so I can work in peace!

name: Pincer through the Sky
quest-details: A Shogun Ceanataur is running rampant over the Swamp Zone! Whether it be human or animal, it is attacking everything in sight. Head to the Swamp and end its reign of terror!

name: Chase the Poison Gypceros!
quest-details: The Gypceros is known to have a fondness for shiny objects. It is also known to occasionally steal ore from humans. Slaying a Gypceros may net you some great treasures.

name: Trouble in the Forest
quest-details: I'm a lumberjack and I'm not OK. Those boar-monsters, the Bullfangos, have been a lot of trouble lately. Can you thin the herd by 20? Much obliged.

name: Seeking the Strange Mask
quest-details: This is awful! The princess saw some strange masked monsters that made her run for the hills! We're sending troops on a hunt for the fiends, so track down the masked marauders!

name: The Ioprey Leader
quest-details: We were just in a fight with a pack of Ioprey, but were routed and had to retreat before we could defeat their leader. Hunt it down for us, but beware of its poison attacks

name: Commander of the Flames
quest-details: Upon our trip into the cave at the volcano, an enormous Shogun Ceanataur dropped down from the ceiling right on top of us! Its ambus caused massive damage! Rid the world of that scourge!

name: Basarios: Unseen Peril
quest-details: A wyvern attacked my team from out of the blue while we were on an expedition to the Volcanic Belt. Where did it come from? Please slay it!

name: A Band of Ceanataurs
quest-details: I wanted to keep digging in search of the ultimate treasure trove... But some Ceanataurs smashed my Pickaxe! If you don't get rid of them, there will be no digging for me! Help me!

name: Great Ore Discovery
quest-details: In a corner of the Volcanic belt. I discovered a great vein of coal in the rocks. I'd like you to mine the coal, but beware the Shogun Ceanataur! Take care and get mining!

name: A Giant Dragon Invades!
goal-condition: Defend the Fortess from Lao-Shan Lung
quest-details: A giant dragon has attacked our fort! If the fort fails, so too do our lands! Use its installed weaponry to make this beast pay for its indiscretions!

name: The Meeting of Daimyo
quest-details: Help! There has been an explosion of so many Daimyo Hermitaurs near our fishing grounds that we can't handle things by ourselves! Get rid of as many as you can so we can get back to fishing!

name: Go Fish GoldenFish
quest-details: I've come from across the sands to sell all manners of strange and unusual wares, but I have a request. Please deliver to me 8 Goldenfish from the desrt. I promise to reward you well!

name: Absolute Power
quest-details: At last, the Tigrex has appeared! It is said the beast's origins are as a flying wyvern. It is too powerful to be allowed to run free. The village is in danger! Hunt it quickly!

name: Absolute Power
quest-details: At last, the Tigrex has appeared! It is said the beast's origins are as a flying wyvern. It is too powerful to be allowed to run free. The village is in danger! Hunt it quickly!

name: The Tigrex's Roar
quest-details: I have an urgent request from a hunter on an expedition in the desert! It seems he has encountered the mighty Tigrex! Go to his aid and crush the beast at once!

name: The Runaway Diablos
quest-details: A giant wyvern smashed the border-wall and ran into this area. We need to find and kill it before it causes any more trouble!

name: The Fierce Black Horn
quest-details: I had hired the most skilled hunters imaginable, and went on a safari for the famed Diablos... But what we found was no mere Diablos! We must slay that black horned wyvern! No matter what!

name: Valor in the Swamp Zone
quest-details: Even in the relative calm of the Swamp Zone, something has stirred up the monsters. In particular, heavily armored wyverns have been attacking us. Can you help us out?

name: Terror of the Gravios
quest-details: A fearsome Gravios has appeared amidst the magma and desolation of the Volcanic Belt. Hunt down the fire breather for us!

name: The King's Domain
quest-details: Did you hear it!? That voice that shook the ground? It even scared the fearless mercenaries! It must have been the king of the skies! But if your're a real hunter, it won't be a problem!

name: Attack of the Rathalos
quest-details: I cannot be... We tried so hard to kill it... But... My entire war band was wiped out by a wyvern. Now it all rest upon your shoulders, monster hunter! Slay it!

name: The Queen's Descent
quest-details: A Rathian is making its nest in the Jungle. This protective mother has made even stepping into the jungle a death sentence. Please clear the Jungle of her threat

name: The Cherry Blossom Rathian
quest-details: A remarkably fierce Pink Rathian has rampaged through lands held by other monsters and caused a great upheaval. You must hunt down and eliminate her to restore order!

name: The Legendary Kirin
quest-details: That must have been the phantom beast... The faint glow, and how it seemed to glide over land... There's no doubt that amazing ricehes await its slayer!

name: The Red and Green Wyverns
quest-details: I must gather Herbs from the Hillside if I am to cure my mother's illness. However, a fire breathing wyvern has settled into the area... If I do nothing, mama will only get worse. Please! Help me!

name: Attack of the Wind Dragon
quest-details: A brown metal dragon is rapidly closing on the town. Scouts report that outlying areas have already been razed. If we don't stop this dragon, our town will be annihilated! We need you!

name: The Sun with Fangs
quest-details: While in the secluded Desert village, I spotted an elder dragon with red scales! While I do know some hunters, it would be wrong to make this request of them... So it's up to you!

name: Emperor of Flame
quest-details: I have an earnest request of you... As the last of my responsibilities, I request your help. I want you to fight the elder fire dragon we cornered in the Volcanic Belt, but beware its flames!

name: Towards the Silence
quest-details: It seems an unknown elder dragon has appeared in the Sawmp Zone. However, no one truly got a clear look at it. What could the beast have been? Slay it, but proceed with caution!

name: Two Little Shadows
quest-details: I was exploring the caverns with my assistants when two small, white shadows popped out of nowhere. Please do something about them as they are hindering my research! ...Actually, what are they??

name: A Horde of Congalalas
quest-details: Large Congalalas continue to gather, and at this rate, they'll completely trash the Swamp and affect our town's way of life. I'm not asking that you get rid of them all, but even 2 would help!

name: The Approaching Gaoren
goal-condition: Slay or repel the Shen Gaoren
quest-details: Hmm... This is quite serious. The fort which lies at the heart of our defenses is under siege by a giant monster. We need your strength to hold our position!
